LanguageData.Warg.label: 座狼
LanguageData.Warg.description: Wargs are heavily-muscled wolf-like creatures. Scientists say wargs are the descendants of weaponized military animals created for population suppression. The superstitious see them as the tools of an angry god.
LanguageData.Warg.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.Warg.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.Warg.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.Nightling.label: 夜灵
LanguageData.Nightling.description: A large deformed beast with rows of quills on its back. The rim is a violent place and the dead are a common sight. But over the years, disturbing reports of ravaged corpses started to increase in surprising numbers, all gut-wrenching and skewered with spikes. Each dawn shedding light to the aftermath of the night before. The locals soon learned to fear the dark, and the nightmares within them.
LanguageData.Nightling.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.Nightling.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.Nightling.tools.3.label: head
